dcterms:creator: V.G. Kovvali
V. Alexiadis
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A comprehensive vehicle trajectory dataset collected by the U.S. Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) in 2005, widely used in transportation research for traffic flow analysis, modeling, and vehicular ad hoc network-related studies. A subset of this dataset is adopted to train the GRU-ED network.
dcterms:title: Next Generation Simulation (NGSIM)
